backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, fields, and tasks with access control, validation, and CRUD operations for authenticated users.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for various frontend components, hooks, and pages describing their responsibilities and recent improvements.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive checklist for verifying builds, deployments, and core app behavior during local development and pre-production checks.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting steps to reproduce and validate field creation failures for anonymous users.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook detailing the process and prerequisites for performing a clean production redeploy of the application.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording production smoke test results across authentication, core functionality, and UI flows.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documentation of a profile save failure, root cause analysis, reproduction steps, fixes applied, and validation tests.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading pre-React globals and the main React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth, boot error detection, retry/logout logic, and rendering core layout.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Fallback system that shows a styled error UI if the app fails before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes global shims and loads boot fallback before React starts.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays searchable, sortable task list with field lookup and task cards.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with auth checks, backend actor readiness, and background selection.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Modal form for creating a task with scale inputs, duration, and dependencies, submitting via useCreateTask. Manages form state and resets on success.
Dialog for editing a field’s name, icon, color, and background using useUpdateField. Loads initial values on open and updates the field on submit.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task attributes, duration, dependencies, and optionally moving the task to another field. Syncs state on open and updates via useUpdateTask or moveTaskToField.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a field with its icon, name, task count, and averaged attributes, using styling from appearance utilities. Acts as a clickable summary card.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: Error boundary that captures rendering failures in the field detail view and shows a recovery UI with reset and back actions.
Full page for viewing a field’s tasks with search, sorting, task creation, field editing, and field deletion. Fetches tasks and displays field-level aggregate metrics.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing a © notice and link to caffeine.ai with a decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling using Internet Identity and cached profile data.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Displays a confirmation dialog for overwriting existing fields and tasks, showing import counts and handling confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a login card with feature list and a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup, collecting a name and handling authentication and backend readiness states.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Displays an error screen with retry, logout, and expandable diagnostic details including clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Provides a button with tooltip to toggle ascending/descending sort direction.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with completion, undo, edit, and delete actions plus attribute and dependency displays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user-related backend data, with detailed error handling and identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, handles retries and errors, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, including extensive field background palettes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with field lists, sorting, search, authentication checks, data import/export, and navigation between fields and tasks.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides helpers to extract text from nested IC errors and classify user-not-registered or stopped-canister errors, plus a safe user-friendly error message extractor.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility to serialize data to JSON (handling BigInt), create a Blob, and trigger a file download with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Functions to convert durations between units, compute total minutes, and format minutes into human-readable strings.
Normalizes export-data errors into categories with user-friendly messages, covering login, actor, authorization, network, and backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines predefined icons and colors for fields, with helpers to resolve icons and color values safely.
Provides a list of background color options for field cards and helpers to resolve background definitions and CSS variables.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors with detection for login, actor state, authorization, and missing-profile cases using safe message extraction.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and parses exported JSON data, converting Principals and BigInt-like fields and applying defaults for field appearance values.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors into categories and user-friendly messages by inspecting error types and messages. Falls back to a safe extracted message for unknown errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including persistence via sessionStorage. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries. Extends theme tokens for UI elements and charts.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and issues, mainly tracking a blank-screen bug and listing feature fixes such as improving icon-picker resilience and adding an error boundary.
